tenantService.title: Tenant Service
tenantService.description: Learn about the Tenant Service for managing tenant-level operations in a multi-tenant serverless CQRS architecture.
tenantService.overview.title: Overview
tenantService.overview.description: The Tenant Service is designed to
tenantService.overview.feature2: Implement CRUD operations for tenant entities
tenantService.overview.feature3: Ensure proper isolation between different tenants
tenantService.overview.feature4: Validate tenant codes and maintain tenant integrity
tenantService.installation.title: Installation
tenantService.basicUsage.title: Basic Usage
tenantService.apiReference.title: API Reference
tenantService.apiReference.validateTenan: Validates if a tenant code exists and is valid
tenantService.integration.title: Integration with Master Settings
tenantService.integration.description: The Tenant Service integrates with the Master Settings Service to manage tenant-specific configurations.
tenantService.integration.seeAlsoDetails: for more details about managing tenant-specific master data and settings.
